Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the organization of the Port Authority
Summary: Relates to port authority organization, appearance and notice; establishes the port authority transportation advisory committee.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
LawCode: Amd Arts 4, 7-B & 7-D, ยง1 of Chap 154 of 1921
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921 relating to the port authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to port authority organization, appearance and notice
